# planarUIAlwaysBehind

**Type Property**

A model sort group that instructs the renderer to draw a model’s mesh behind a SwiftUI layer that’s coincident with the mesh. See [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ModelSortGroup/PlanarUIPlacement-swift.enum] for usage.

## Declaration

```swift
static let planarUIAlwaysBehind: ModelSortGroup
```
title: planarUIAlwaysBehind
